PERSONA.NAME: King Henry the Fifth
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Formerly Prince Hal, marries the French king's daughter (Katherine).

PERSONA.NAME: Duke of York
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Cousin to the King, killed at Agincourt

PERSONA.NAME: Archbishop of Canterbury
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Persuades King Henry to claim the French throne

PERSONA.NAME: Bishop of Ely
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Ad admirer of King Henry V.

PERSONA.NAME: Earl of Cambridge
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Bribed by the French to kill Henry V.

PERSONA.NAME: Lord Scroop
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Bribed by the French to kill Henry V.

PERSONA.NAME: Sir Thomas Grey
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Bribed by the French to kill Henry V.

PERSONA.NAME: Sir Thomas Erpingham
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: An officer in King Henry's army

PERSONA.NAME: Gower
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: An officer in King Henry's army

PERSONA.NAME: Fluellen
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A Welsh officer in King Henry's army

PERSONA.NAME: Macmorris
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: An officer in King Henry's army

PERSONA.NAME: Jamy
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: An officer in King Henry's army

PERSONA.NAME: Bates
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A soldier in King Henry's army

PERSONA.NAME: Court
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A soldier in King Henry's army

PERSONA.NAME: Williams
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A soldier in King Henry's army

PERSONA.NAME: Charles the Sixth, King of France
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: King of France, father of Katherine

PERSONA.NAME: Lewis, the Dauphin
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Also called the Dolphin, son to King Charles and heir to the French throne

PERSONA.NAME: Duke of Orleance
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A French noble killed at Agincourt.

PERSONA.NAME: Duke of Bourbon
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A French noble killed at Agincourt.

PERSONA.NAME: Duke of Britain
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A French noble killed at Agincourt.

PERSONA.NAME: Duke of Berri
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A French noble killed at Agincourt.

PERSONA.NAME: Isabel, Queen of France
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Queen of France, mother to Katherine

PERSONA.NAME: Katherine
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Daughter to Charles and Isabel, later marries Henry V

PERSONA.NAME: Hostess
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Formerly Mistress Nell Quickly of the Boar’s Head Tavern in Eastcheap, now married to Pistol
